Gab Social Network Analysis

In recent work, Raphtory has been used to study the evolution of a fairly new social network Gab used largely by the alt-right. For a deep delve into this topic, take a look at our paper “Moving with the times: Investigating the alt right network Gab using temporal interaction graphs”
